data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea abies (Norway spruce) from sample KOLIBG-71

Exposition E, Slope 15 deg, Geology: Schiefer, Paläoz, Tree line 500 m, av. Tree height 28 m, Tree cover 85%, Shrub cover 5%, Herb cover 80%, Moss cover 90%, Vegatation type: Myrtillo-Piceetum, Film number: 531A
